TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/ColumnHeaderCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 控件中的列标题的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of column headers in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时，类将存储在控件中显示的列标题 。A class stores the column headers that are displayed in the control when the property is set to . 存储 对象，这些对象定义要为列显示的文本以及列标题在显示列时在控件中的显示方式 。The stores objects that define the text to display for a column as well as how the column header is displayed in the control when displaying columns. 显示列时，项及其子项显示在其自己的列中。When a displays columns, the items and their subitems are displayed in their own columns. 若要指定在其下显示子项数据的列，请参阅 类。To specify which columns subitem data is displayed under, see the class. 可以通过多种方法向集合中添加列标题。There are a number of ways to add column headers to the collection. 方法向集合中添加一个列标头。The method adds a single column header to the collection. 若要向集合中添加多个列标题，请创建一个对象数组 ，并将其传递给 方法。To add a number of column headers to the collection, you create an array of objects and pass it to the method. 如果要在集合中的特定位置插入列标题，可以使用 方法。If you want to insert a column header at a specific location in the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除列标题，你可以使用 方法或方法（ 如果你知道列标题在集合中的位置）。To remove column headers, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the column header is located in the collection. 方法允许您从集合中移除所有列标题，而不是使用 方法一次删除一个列标题。The method allows you to remove all column headers from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single column header at a time. 除了用于添加和删除列标题的方法和属性外， 还提供用于在集合中查找列标题的方法。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing column headers, the also provides methods to find column headers in the collection. 使用 方法可以确定列标题是否为集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether a column header is a member of the collection. 知道列标题位于集合中后，您可以使用 方法来确定列标题在集合中的位置。Once you know that the column header is located in the collection, you can use the method to determine where the column header is located in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 当所有列的组合宽度超过32768像素时，可能会产生意外行为。Unexpected behavior can result when the combined width of all columns exceeds 32,768 pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个窗体，该窗体包含一个 控件，该控件在单击控件中的列时手动对项进行排序 。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 该示例定义一个名为 `ListViewItemComparer` 的类，该类实现 执行比较的接口 。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 该示例创建一个实例 `ListViewItemComparer` ，并使用它来设置 控件的属性 。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 事件处理程序中的方法调用 使用在中定义的方法 `ListViewItemComparer` ，根据所单击的列来执行项的排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. [!code-cpp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CPP/listviewsort1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CS/listviewsort1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/VB/listviewsort1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此版本的 方法将现有添加 到集合中。You can use this version of the method to add an existing to the collection. 如果要 在将其添加到集合时创建新的，可以使用方法的其他版本 。If you want to create a new at the time you add it to the collection, you can use the other version of the method. 添加列标题后，它们将添加到集合的末尾。When column headers are added, they are added to the end of the collection. 若要将列标题插入到集合中的特定位置，请使用 方法。To insert a column header into the collection at a specific position, use the method. 若要在单个操作中将一组列标题添加到集合中，请使用 方法。To add a set of column headers to the collection in a single operation, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个窗体，该窗体包含一个 控件，该控件在单击控件中的列时手动对项进行排序 。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 该示例定义一个名为 `ListViewItemComparer` 的类，该类实现 执行比较的接口 。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 该示例创建一个实例 `ListViewItemComparer` ，并使用它来设置 控件的属性 。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 事件处理程序中的方法调用 使用在中定义的方法 `ListViewItemComparer` ，根据所单击的列来执行项的排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此版本的 方法创建一个新的 以添加到集合中。You can use this version of the method to create a new to add to the collection. 新 添加到控件中的文本基于 `text` 参数。The text of the new added to the control is based on the `text` parameter. 此版本的 方法还允许您指定列标题的列的宽度和文本的对齐方式。This version of the method also allows you to specify the width of the column and the alignment of text in the column header. 如果你有想要 添加到集合中的现有，请使用 接受作为参数的方法的版本 。If you have an existing that you want to add to the collection, use the version of the method that accepts a as its parameter. 添加列标题后，它们将添加到集合的末尾。When column headers are added, they are added to the end of the collection. 若要将列标题插入到集合中的特定位置，请使用 方法。To insert a column header into the collection at a specific position, use the method. 若要在单个操作中将一组列标题添加到集合中，请使用 方法。To add a set of column headers to the collection in a single operation, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于中的列的键 。The property corresponds to the key for a column in the . 密钥比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not-case sensitive. 如果 `key` 为 `null` 或空字符串，则不 更改集合`.`If `key` is `null` or an empty string, does not change the collection`.`

param.name: dest
param.span: 作为集合中元素的复制目标位置的一维数组。

span.span: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.

param.span: 该数组的索引必须从零开始。

span.span: The array must have zero-based indexing.

param.name: index
param.span: 数组中开始复制的位置的索引（从零开始）。

span.span: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.

summary.span: 将 中的 对象复制到一个数组中从特定的数组索引开始的位置。

span.span: Copies the objects in the to an array, starting at a particular array index.
